name: Broken System (Mekyi)
description:
Broken System - LD#49 

Old school point and click game, where you fight against time! Your job includes moving files to their correct folders, organizing your desktop and getting rid of extra content.

You fight against a bar that shrinks by the second. By completing tasks you get extra time, but don't over work yourself or the computer will overheat!

DISCLAIMER
We ran out of time and couldn't finish the game. We wanted to make a point & click game because we haven't made anything like it before. New challenges and problems were difficult, but we learned a lot despite running out of time.

Controls
- Left Mouse Button (Click/Drag)

Submission to  the Ludum Dare  #49 (theme: Unstable)

Credits  
Programming: Veetittititi, Mekyi, JareTheCoder
Graphics: Veetittititi
Music & Sounds: Short Record (freesound.org)
